phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
A new dungeon was discovered on the border of the Clover Kingdom.
Asta, Noelle, and Luck of the Black Bulls were assigned to investigate it.
The dungeon was filled with traps.
We are going to die if we stay with this guy.
I think I am about to reach my limit.
So I am leaving the dungeon exploration to you guys!
No matter what kind of traps might spring up, I will slice through them with my sword.
Asta and Noelle were in danger.
I would always close my eyes
Of just making excuses to give up
I do not want to be near you
(The decisive battle is still a long way off)
I will give up on giving up
And get the world on my side
I am looking for the reason I am alive
Every time somewhere under this sky
And head where the light shines
I want to keep my promise
I will deliver it to you
Sir, about the exploration of the new dungeon...
Why did you send that new peasant recruit on such an important mission?
I, Alecdora Sandler, am ready to die for you.
In that case, I would like you to trust him, too.
He is also a member of the Golden Dawn.
I am sure he will become an even more powerful force for us.
We need him to get stronger.
why did you bother saving them?
Our only mission is to explore this dungeon...
In other words, to quickly reach the treasure chamber buried deep below.
We do not have any time to waste on these fools.
What is the deal with this rude four-eyed dude?
I am a four... er, I am a nobleman!
How dare you address me so casually?!
He is flustered all of a sudden.
Member of the Golden Dawn Mimosa Vermillion
I do not think I have seen you since the royal banquet last year.
It just had to be her...
I have heard the Black Bulls are a very barbaric squad.
And are you doing okay, Mimosa?
I am not sure someone as dense as you can make it in the Golden Dawn.
Because of that, I have been able to use my magic without hesitation.
If I remember correctly, you were not able to control your magic at all.
She is as obliviously rude as ever.
I-I have been working on it.
Oh, the three of us recently received a star from the Wizard King himself
We just got a star, too!
Newbies from the Black Bulls would not be awarded stars so easily.
We are at minus thirty now!
It is laughable that you have been charged with this mission, too.
The Wizard King appointed us to this mission himself!
Come to think of it, I heard there would be three of you, too.
Do not tell me they left you two and ran.
Or did they fall prey to one of the traps?
He did not run away, nor did he fall prey to any of the traps.
There is no way we can tell them he ditched us and went off somewhere.
Regardless, it is clear your lot consists of filth that leaves new recruits behind.
You are an embarrassment to the Magic Knights.
You have got some nerve, you jerk!
We are going to conquer this dungeon first for the Black Bulls!
Just you wait, Gol... No, Goober?
No, uh... you guys with the weird masked captain!
You dare mock our esteemed Captain Vangeance?!
You are the ones with a weird captain!
What kind of freak runs around with all those muscles bulging out of a tank top?!
He is manly and totally awesome!
How dare you talk to a noble like that?!
We will just have to show you the difference between the top of the Magic Knights
Plant Creation Magic: Magic Flower Guidepost.
I have learned the basic layout of the dungeon.
He can carry all three of them so easily.
Let us see which of us gets to the treasure chamber first!
And what are we supposed to do?
Neither of us can use tracking spells!
We will just have to check every path very carefully!
I am going to do this!
At this rate, we will get lost before we even find the treasure chamber!
There is no way he can beat us.
I could not sense any magic from him.
What was the captain of the Black Bulls thinking,
It is best that you do not underestimate him.
They will do well enough to get out of this dungeon alive.
I am just trying to conquer this dungeon as fast as possible, for our country's sake.
I have a report for the Wizard King.
The two Magic Knight Squads, the Golden Dawn and the Black Bulls,
have begun their investigations of the dungeon.
We have also confirmed that a military mage squad from the Diamond Kingdom is there.
They have been trying to expand their borders lately.
There will be trouble if we let them steal the ancient magic
that might be in the dungeon.
Who is in charge of this invasion from Diamond?
The one leading the enemy squad is Lotus of the Abyss.
Ah... I have met him on the battlefield before.
The magic he used was really interesting.
Sir, should you sound so amused right now?
Should not you be more concerned?
Do not worry, it is fine.
I hear Yami's sent an interesting one on this mission.
Lotus is strong, but our kids are strong, too.
But I am sure you are different.
Nothing good comes of raising hurdles too high.
You took my subordinates out in an instant.
But if you are their boss and you are strong, there is no problem.
So you fight wrapped in your own lightning magic.
Not only is that practical, but you seem pretty powerful.
You are making the most of your youthful strength.
You have got this old man shaking in his boots.
What kind of magic do you fight with?
You Clover people are also after this dungeon's treasure chamber, are not you?
Actually, I am pretty sure we do not have to fight.
I can see why the citizens of the Clover Kingdom would be mad.
I mean, we have been trying to invade here and there.
I apologize for all the trouble the Diamond Kingdom's been causing you.
But you see, our kingdom's running out of resources, so we have it rough, too.
If we want to survive, we do not really have a choice.
You see, I have three daughters...
I do not care as long as I get to fight strong people.
Looks like I have caught the eye of some real trouble.
This old man might just cry.
Are you sure we are going the right way?
Yeah, that is definitely not treasure.
That has to be a trap!
What are you going to do if it is a trap?
Wh-Why did you have to show me that, Shrimpsta?!
You are so full of life.
Stop dodging, and let us fight!
I have fought with your captain before.
He gave me this lovely scar.
I pissed my pants and ran.
He had a very unusual fighting style.
He was the only younger opponent I have had that I could not defeat.
That makes you even more worth figh
Little by little, fall right into the abyss.
But I do not remember getting hit by his magic...
You see, this whole room is enveloped in my magic.
Very thin smoke that you cannot really see.
It is called Weakening Smoke Magic: Garden of Plundering Smoke, if you were wondering.
My body's not listening to me.
A spell that lowers physical abilities?
I had a feeling you would block it if it were a visible attack.
I lowered my magical ability as much as I could
so I could use this without you noticing...
While you were fighting my subordinates.
They did not go out in vain.
They sacrificed themselves so I could use this spell.
It is very important, is not it?
Once we get through this tunnel...
That is all there is to dungeons?
I wonder how you get in.
It appears the Black Bulls are not here yet.
There is no way they would beat us.
It ripped through her magic-shielding cloak...
She is an expert at sensing mana, but she did not notice?
You are alive, are not you?
That was not a trap spell...
Friends you can trust are worth their weight in gold.
Sorry, but stay there a while and get weaker.
I would rather not pluck a bud that is still so young...
My dry emotions gaze at the me from that day
(I cannot find a place to go)
Even the faintest light can still break through the darkness
And change the flow of time
In order to grasp my endless dream
If there is a path that I should choose
Until my life comes to an end
I will accept any pain that comes my way
(We can try again, we can try again)
Even if we cannot see tomorrow
Holding onto feelings too intense to voice
I will keep screaming them in my heart
A Lotus Flower That Does not Bloom Is Just a Lotus
A Lotus Flower That Does not Bloom Is Just a Lotus.
You see, I have three daughters...
When I get older, I am going to marry you, Daddy!
And all three of them fight over me.
Do not mix my laundry with yours!
I am sure they will say things like that.
And my wife was so nice when we first met, but now...
This is really annoying, so I think I am ready to fall into the abyss now.
Not giving up is my magic.
